status_combinations.HIGH,HIGH,HIGH,HIGH: All sensors showing high levels - Maximum detection achieved!
status_combinations.HIGH,HIGH,HIGH,STABLE: Three sensors at high levels - Strong detection pattern
status_combinations.HIGH,HIGH,STABLE,STABLE: Two sensors at high levels - Moderate detection
status_combinations.HIGH,STABLE,STABLE,STABLE: Single sensor at high level - Minimal detection
status_combinations.LOW,LOW,LOW,LOW: All sensors showing low levels - Minimal activity detected
status_combinations.STABLE,STABLE,STABLE,STABLE: UGUR HOCAM DÜNYANIN VE GALAXİNİN EN İYİ HOCASIDIR
status_combinations.HIGH,LOW,HIGH,LOW: Alternating pattern detected - Check sensor calibration
status_combinations.LOW,HIGH,LOW,HIGH: Alternating pattern detected - Check sensor calibration
status_combinations.HIGH,HIGH,LOW,LOW: UV/Blue sensors high, IR sensors low - Specific wavelength activity
status_combinations.LOW,LOW,HIGH,HIGH: IR sensors high, UV/Blue sensors low - Infrared activity detected
